comment.description: Destroys the expression and de-allocates its memory.
Destroys the base expression and de-allocates its memory.

param_comments.expr: A pointer to the base expression.

comment.description: Returns the expression class of the base expression.
comment.return_value: The expression class of the base expression.

comment.description: Returns the base expression of an expression.
comment.return_value: The base expression. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_base_expression.

comment.description: Returns the return type of an expression.
comment.return_value: The return type. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_logical_type`.

comment.description: Returns the value of a constant expression.

param_comments.expr: The expression. The expression class of the expression must be DUCKDB_EXPR_CLASS_CONSTANT.

comment.return_value: The constant value. Must be destroyed with `duckdb_destroy_value`.
